languages.text: "Смерть каждого, что покоится в этом чертоге, была наградой за деяния во славу Его. Пусть же финал нашего пути будет славен не менее, чем исходы тех, что были до нас..." {n}Кибелла затихает. А затем негромко и нежно произносит:{/n} "Возьми меня за руку. Так же вступим мы в чертоги, предназначенные для нас".

traits.locale_text: "Смерть каждого, что покоится в этом чертоге, была наградой за деяния их во славу Его — так пусть же финал нашего пути будет славен не менее, чем исходы тех, что были до нас..." {n}Кибелла затихает. А затем негромко и нежно произносит:{/n} "Возьми меня за руку. Так же вступим мы в чертоги, предназначенные для нас".

languages.text: "All who rest in these halls do so as a reward for the deeds they performed in His name. May the end of our journey be as glorious as that of all who came before us..." {n}Kibellah trails off. Eventually, she adds, softly and quietly,{/n} "Take my hand. Thus shall we walk into the halls we are destined for."
languages.original_text: "Смерть каждого, что покоится в этом чертоге, была наградой за деяния во славу Его. Пусть же финал нашего пути будет славен не менее, чем исходы тех, что были до нас..." {n}Кибелла затихает. А затем негромко и нежно произносит:{/n} "Возьми меня за руку. Так же вступим мы в чертоги, предназначенные для нас".

traits.locale_text: "All who rest in these halls do so as a reward for deeds performed in His name. May the end of our journey be as glorious as the end of those who came before us..." {n}Kibellah trails off. Then she says, softly and quietly,{/n} "Take my hand. Thus will we walk into the halls we are destined for."

"All who rest in these halls do so as a reward for deeds performed in His name. May the end of our journey be as glorious as the end of those who came before us..." {n}Kibellah trails off. Then she says, softly and quietly,{/n} "Take my hand. Thus will we walk into the halls we are destined for."

Eventually, she adds, softly and quietly,{/n} "Take my hand. Thus shall we walk into the halls we are destined for."

"All who rest in these halls do so as a reward for the deeds they performed in His name. May the end of our journey be as glorious as that of all who came before us..." {n}Kibellah trails off. Eventually, she adds, softly and quietly,{/n} "Take my hand. Thus shall we walk into the halls we are destined for."

"All who rest in these halls do so as a reward for the deeds they performed in His name. May the end of our journey be as glorious as that of all who came before us..." {n}Kibellah trails off. Eventually, she adds, softly and quietly,{/n} "Take my hand. Thus shall we walk into the halls we are destined for."

"All who rest in these halls do so as a reward for the deeds they performed in His name. May the end of our journey be as glorious as that of all who came before us..." {n}Kibellah trails off. Eventually, she adds, softly and quietly,{/n} "Take my hand. Thus shall we walk into the halls we are destined for."

languages.text: "Alle, die in diesen Hallen ruhen, tun dies als Belohnung für die Taten, die sie in seinem Namen vollbracht haben. Möge das Ende unserer Reise so glorreich sein wie das von allen, die vor uns kamen ..." {n}Kibellah verstummt. Schließlich fügt sie hinzu, leise und sanft:{/n} "Nehmt meine Hand. So werden wir in die Hallen schreiten, für die wir bestimmt sind."
languages.original_text: "All who rest in these halls do so as a reward for the deeds they performed in His name. May the end of our journey be as glorious as that of all who came before us..." {n}Kibellah trails off. Eventually, she adds, softly and quietly,{/n} "Take my hand. Thus shall we walk into the halls we are destined for."

traits.locale_text: "Alle, die in diesen Hallen ruhen, tun dies als Belohnung für die Taten, die sie in seinem Namen vollbracht haben. Möge das Ende unserer Reise so glorreich sein wie das von allen, die vor uns kamen ..." {n}Kibellah verstummt. Schließlich fügt sie hinzu, leise und sanft:{/n} "Nehmt meine Hand. So werden wir in die Hallen schreiten, für die wir bestimmt sind."

languages.text: «Todos cuantos descansan en estas salas lo hacen en recompensa por las proezas que realizaron en Su nombre. Que el final de nuestro camino sea tan glorioso como el de nuestros predecesores...». {n}Kibellah deja la frase en el aire. Finalmente, añade en voz queda y suave:{/n} «Coja mi mano. Así caminaremos hacia las salas a las que estamos destinad{mf|o|a}s».
languages.original_text: "All who rest in these halls do so as a reward for the deeds they performed in His name. May the end of our journey be as glorious as that of all who came before us..." {n}Kibellah trails off. Eventually, she adds, softly and quietly,{/n} "Take my hand. Thus shall we walk into the halls we are destined for."

traits.locale_text: «Todos cuantos descansan en estas salas lo hacen en recompensa por las proezas que realizaron en Su nombre. Que el final de nuestro camino sea tan glorioso como el de nuestros predecesores...». {n}Kibellah deja la frase en el aire. Finalmente, añade en voz queda y suave:{/n} «Coja mi mano. Así caminaremos hacia las salas a las que estamos destinad{mf|o|a}s».

languages.text: 「主の名において行った行為に対する報酬として、この広間で休む者は誰もがそうする。私たちの旅の終わりが、先人たちの旅の終わりと同様に輝かしいものでありますように…」{n}キベラが言葉を途切れさせる。やがて彼女は、柔らかい声で静かに付け加えた。{/n}「私の手を取って。これで私たちは、運命の広間へと歩を進めるの」
languages.original_text: "All who rest in these halls do so as a reward for the deeds they performed in His name. May the end of our journey be as glorious as that of all who came before us..." {n}Kibellah trails off. Eventually, she adds, softly and quietly,{/n} "Take my hand. Thus shall we walk into the halls we are destined for."

traits.locale_text: 「主の名において行った行為に対する報酬として、この広間で休む者は誰もがそうする。私たちの旅の終わりが、先人たちの旅の終わりと同様に輝かしいものでありますように…」{n}キベラが言葉を途切れさせる。やがて彼女は、柔らかい声で静かに付け加えた。{/n}「私の手を取って。これで私たちは、運命の広間へと歩を進めるの」

languages.text: “凡在这殿堂里安息之人，都是由于奉行祂的旨意而得到了安宁的恩赐。当我们抵达旅途的终点时，愿我们能像先人一样荣耀加身……”{n}绮贝菈的声音渐渐消失。最后，她又轻声补充道。{/n}“握住我的手，踏入我们注定会踏入的殿堂。”
languages.original_text: "All who rest in these halls do so as a reward for the deeds they performed in His name. May the end of our journey be as glorious as that of all who came before us..." {n}Kibellah trails off. Eventually, she adds, softly and quietly,{/n} "Take my hand. Thus shall we walk into the halls we are destined for."

traits.locale_text: “凡在这殿堂里安息之人，都是由于奉行祂的旨意而得到了安宁的恩赐。当我们抵达旅途的终点时，愿我们能像先人一样荣耀加身……”{n}绮贝菈的声音渐渐消失。最后，她又轻声补充道。{/n}“握住我的手，踏入我们注定会踏入的殿堂。”

languages.text: « Ceux qui reposent dans ces salles ont accompli des exploits en Son nom. Que la fin de notre voyage soit aussi glorieuse que celle de ceux qui nous ont précédés... » {n}Kibellah s'interrompt un instant avant d'ajouter dans un murmure :{/n} « Prenez ma main, afin que nous puissions entrer dans les salles auxquelles nous sommes {mf|destinés|destinées}. »
languages.original_text: "All who rest in these halls do so as a reward for the deeds they performed in His name. May the end of our journey be as glorious as that of all who came before us..." {n}Kibellah trails off. Eventually, she adds, softly and quietly,{/n} "Take my hand. Thus shall we walk into the halls we are destined for."

traits.locale_text: « Ceux qui reposent dans ces salles ont accompli des exploits en Son nom. Que la fin de notre voyage soit aussi glorieuse que celle de ceux qui nous ont précédés... » {n}Kibellah s'interrompt un instant avant d'ajouter dans un murmure :{/n} « Prenez ma main, afin que nous puissions entrer dans les salles auxquelles nous sommes {mf|destinés|destinées}. »

languages.text: "Bu salonlarda istirahat eden herkes, bu hakkı O'nun adına gerçekleştirdikleri eylemlerin ödülü olarak kazanır. Bizim yolculuğumuzun sonu da bizden önce gelenler kadar şanlı olsun..." {n}Kibellah'nın sesinin şiddeti azalıyor. En nihayetinde hafif ve kısık bir tonda konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Elimi tut ki yazgımıza işlenmiş salonlara doğru yürüyebilelim."
languages.original_text: "All who rest in these halls do so as a reward for the deeds they performed in His name. May the end of our journey be as glorious as that of all who came before us..." {n}Kibellah trails off. Eventually, she adds, softly and quietly,{/n} "Take my hand. Thus shall we walk into the halls we are destined for."
